price: (49) Who fear their Lord unseen,[889] while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ
footnotes: [889]- Which can mean "Him being unseen" by them or "though they are unseen" by others.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
